packages.description: Zeppelin is a web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics
packages.name: zeppelin
packages.postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Zeppelin is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/zeppelin/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/

___executor_docker_image.description: The docker image to launch Spark executors with.  By default, this will use this value specified in this package's resource.json

___uri.description: A URI serving the Spark distribution to use for the local Zeppelin Spark context.  By default, this will use the value specified in this package's resource.json

___zeppelin_java_opts.description: Sets ZEPPELIN_JAVA_OPTS.  You can use this to set arbitrary spark configuration properties (e.g. spark.mesos.uris)
